resources.string: An initiative for predicting covid-19 contamination. The application is able to help users by predicting incidents of covid-19 contamination. User can keep track of respiration rate, temperature and oxygen saturation rate. Respiration rate is a vital parameter for detecting diagnosis of pneumonia. \nThe app is a prototype which is developed by the developers of Bibeat Ltd to combat covid 19. \nBibeat Website: https://bibeat.com/
1. Enter age and press the Measure Button to start the measurement process.
2. For each INHALE or EXHALE tap on the specific location shown in the screen.
3. Each tap is confirmed when the tap sign blinks.
